data.text:
Over the years I have been in practice, I have been trained in and worked with people struggling with various issues. These include:

Psychotherapy with parents and adults

Play therapy

Trauma with children and adults

Anxiety and depression

Adoption

Child-Parent attachment and parenting skills

Adolescent adjustment issues

Relationship growth and couples work (Trained/supervised by Shelley Nathans, Ph.D.)

Intergenerational transmission of trauma

Aging (Trained/supervised by Harvey Peskin, Ph.D.)

I have provided over 20 years of individual and group clinical supervision with psychology practicum students, post-doctoral students, and MFT interns. In addition, I have supervised students and post-doctoral fellows from institutions all over the Bay Area and beyond.
